ooC: I saw that you'd sorted it out, but I was using it as an 
example. =)

-- Lynxiz --

Lynxiz eyes Lionconvoy as he approaches. "Hellow Lioconvoy, I met 
that bot as well, he seemed to be a friendly sort of bot. Anyway, I 
received your summons about joining this faction. I was interested, 
so I came. Mind explainging who you are and what your goals are?"

The relaxed lynx stretches, and looks at Doomsday, "Well, a two bot 
welcoming party. Interesting." A feral grin crosses her face.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "hotgy69420" <hotgy69420@y...> wrote:
> Lioconvoy/Doomsday
> They both get to Lynixz but the new bot got there way ahead of 
> Lioconvoy and waits for Lioconvoy to get there.
> Lioconvoy: Lynxiz I am Lioconvoy i am here to get you and bring 
you 
> into the base.I just happened to meet a new bot on the way and he 
> took a little time away other wise i would've been here faster.
> Doomsday:Lynxiz,Lioconvoy I am Doomsday I have been sent here to 
help 
> you and so has my brother Icey Doom which is were i left him but i 
> came to bring you to the base as well Lynxiz.
